project.name: x11-drivers
project.author: Donnie Berkholz
project.description: The X11-Drivers herd manages the external X drivers in Portage.

longdescription.p: The X11-Drivers herd manages the external X drivers in Portage. This includes drivers and kernel modules such as ati-drivers, nvidia-kernel, nvidia-glx and x11-drm.

goals.p: The herd aims to support external X drivers. Increasing the ease of integration with X and making configuration automatic or easier are parts of its goals.

body.p: If you want to get involved with improving Gentoo's X experience, we'd like to hear from you! The main thing you'll want to do is be active on Gentoo's Bugzilla. Also please join desktop project members in #gentoo-desktop on irc.freenode.net.
